letters.description: Establish a mindful connection with nature and facilitate client self-reflection on their current state and intentions for the session.
Guide clients to actively observe their surroundings using all senses, fostering a deeper awareness of the natural environment and their place within it.
Create space for clients to open themselves to the healing potential of the forest, offering invitations and activities that encourage exploration and engagement.
Support clients in processing their experiences, identifying shifts in perspective, and integrating insights into their daily lives.
Empower clients to sustain their connection with nature through ongoing practices and encourage them to share their experiences to promote well-being in their communities.
